theruses4|the ability|the [[pluma]] spell|Magic resistance (spell)}}
'''Magic resistance''' was an innate ability that could prevent [[magic]] from taking effect on a creature or person.<ref><ref><ref>
document_data.In Creatures: Various creatures steeped in magic, like the [[drow]] and most [[dragon]]s and [[fiend]]s, possessed magic resistance, as did strongly anti-magical ones. The likelyhood to negate any one spell or effect varied widely between different species.<ref><ref>
document_data.Through Magic:
Certain magical items, like a ''[[potion of magic resistance]]'' or ''[[robe of the archmagi]]'', also granted this ability.<ref><ref>

The [[pluma]] spell also named ''[[Magic resistance (spell)|magic resistance]]'' was used to cancel magic in a limited area, but worked technically closer to an ''[[anti-magic shell]]''.<ref><ref>

The spells ''[[lower resistance]]'', ''[[pierce magic resistance]]'' and ''[[pierce any shield]]'' on the other hand were designed to improve the chance to overcome creatures' innate resistance against magic.<ref><ref>
